Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-41810 affecting package python-twisted for versions less than 22.10.0-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-41810 affecting package python-twisted for versions less than 22.10.0-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-twisted is earlier than 22.10.0-3, affected by CVE-2024-41810
